title: 'Server is currently busy'
body: Does anyone got this message? I have problems of this lately getting connected.

replies.body:
still also randomly having this issue
game also crashed earlier, mid way through an ARAM
It hasn't been resolved for me, for the first three attempts it says that the servers are busy but the 4th attempt logs me straight in, is it just my pc or is this a server/global bug? {{item:3070}}
This issue should be resolved now, can you all confirm/deny this for me?

Hey there,

This issue is currently being investigated, i'll update this reply when I know more.
